website_summaries.verdict: A nice sized rubber bumper at a good price that works well.
pros: Comes with steel plates and bolts for mounting
cons: Depth is shorter than other rubber bumpers available

customer_reviews.title: Only if you can make due...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor craftsmanship... The inside molding cut is not square to the outside shape so the bump stop will sit crooked after install (by about 15 degrees)
customer_reviews.author: Weinnand S.

customer_reviews.title: Install these bumpers and your done fixing these walls.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my garage wall. Was tired fixing repeated dents from my suv doors and the repainting. Easy to install. Drill, screwdriver, level and 2 long screws, not much else. They supplied 2 washer to help keep the screw attached to the bumper. You need to supply your screws. I saw cheaper solutions, cheesy way to go. Just install and your done. Wife loves them. She doesn't need to tell me to fix the walls. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bumpers
customer_reviews.text: I used them in the FWD side of my camper. Nice and rigid, it will keep my camper from sliding in when driving on wash boards. A third set of holes in the middle would have been nice for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Should do the job
customer_reviews.text: Seems okay. I bought the 36 inch also and it was bigger diameter than this,so they don't match up exactly even next to each other. Product seems good though.
customer_reviews.author: J T.

customer_reviews.title: rubber
customer_reviews.text: I issue is that they were not exactly the same. I purchased 1 and then ordered a second and it was not the same size. not a deal breaker but tolerances were not exact
customer_reviews.author: scott silva

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these to put on my car trailer folding ramps.I didn't want to just drop them on the concrete/gravel each time.Good quality for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: JPFLYONE

customer_reviews.title: Very tough bumper.
customer_reviews.text: This bumper is very tough. I used 2 of them to replace the bumpers on a 24 foot box truck. Worked very well. Each comes with two steel plates with holes in them for the bolts to provide extra holding power. The hole in the outside of the bumper is big enough to fit a socket through to tighten. The holes are large enough for an impact socket also which makes it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Trombetta

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good. Working well outside. Keeps my gate latch from banging into my shed. Mounted on my shed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a trailer bumper. Heavy duty. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: The write up says 2 bumpers but only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: size not as stated/ wavey matereial
customer_reviews.text: product received was 4 x 4 not 4-1/4 x 4 as advertised. In my application, the size was very important. Product edge was wavey- not straight. The round washers that were included are worthless. They are smaller than the mounting holes, so they just fall thru the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Not a Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to my horse trailer ramp
customer_reviews.text: Was the correct size, cut in half and installed on the trailer ramp for stability.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Strong and weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found these earlier. I used them on a custom bumper project and they do fine. The included bolts saved me some shopping and fitting time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Osinski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helps prevent my car door from banging against my drywall in garage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a door stop and works great for that!
customer_reviews.author: Jadon Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Works great except I received two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two to mount on front my utility trailer, to protect my Polaris UTV. Works great except I received two different sizes, one was 2 inches wide and the other was 1-7/8 inch wide (and a thinner material). Great product though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of them to mount on an atv winch bumper, and both are different sizes. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Richard

customer_reviews.title: Much better than regular boat bumper
customer_reviews.text: This works for keeping boat off dock. Much better than regular boat bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our garage because we have a large SUV which barely fits in our garage. It would be nice if it came in white so it doesn't stand out so obviously on our wall, but I can but right up to it which is great.
customer_reviews.author: jfw1021

customer_reviews.title: Great bumpers
customer_reviews.text: I use these for bumpers on our water taxis, and we are super happy with the durability and shock absorption ability. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: LC Marine Systems

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty rubber bumper I used for boat lift rails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps our bumpers from getting bent!
customer_reviews.text: I put it on the bumper of our box truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first truck to back into the set we bolted ...
customer_reviews.text: The first truck to back into the set we bolted on the dock crushed the rubber into pieces - had to replace with solid rubber type bumper. Of course this happened 2 days after the 30 day return policy expired...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Largeteau

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, however, as a truck loads or unloads the bed slides on the bumper. Don't back up hard and set the brake. It will come off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Ray

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, probably made for truck loading docks, but I think they will work perfect on my boat dock.
customer_reviews.author: Lari Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I thought it would be very solid with a strong backing plate
customer_reviews.author: RWES

customer_reviews.title: This bumper might be good for a small lite boat
customer_reviews.text: This bumper might be good for a small lite boat, but my 34 footer has forced the bumper off the bolt/washers. The bumper then bends to the side exposing the bolt. This is FAR WORSE then having no bumper at all as the bolt will tear up your boat - I spotted this in time to prevent damage. The rubber didn't even tear, the bolt/washer just pulled through the hole. Like I said, if you have a larger and/or heavier boat - this is not the bumper you want. These were not inexpensive, now I have spend even more money to get something that will work.
customer_reviews.author: David Draper

product_meta.title: Vestil M-2-12 Rubber Extruded Bumper, 12" Length, 2" Width, 1-3/4" Depth,Black
product_meta.description:
Size:12 inches Length, 2 inches Width, 1-3/4 inches Depth

This Vestil M-2-12 extruded rubber bumper is 12" in length, 2" wide, and is used to prevent damage by a vehicle to a dock or building. The pad has a depth of 1-3/4" and is made of molded rubber for elasticity and resistance to impact and weather. Its half-oval shape provides a fendering action over a wide radius. This bumper has pre-drilled countersunk mounting holes for easy installation, with washers for each hole.

Vestil manufactures materials handling equipment, including hoists and trolleys, jib and gantry cranes, loading dock equipment, and storage solutions. The company, founded in 1968, is headquartered in Angola, IN.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 * M-2-12 bumper
 * Washers
feature_bullets: Loading dock bumper for preventing damage by a vehicle to dock or building
Rubber for elasticity and resistance to impact and weather
Half-oval shape for fendering action over a wide radius
Pre-drilled countersunk mounting holes for easy installation
